title: It's Officially a Butter-Yellow Summer—27 of the Chicest Finds at Zara, Nordstrom, and J.Crew
description: Fashion people love this color trend.
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
excerpt: Fashion people love this color trend.
text: One thing is certain: When a color trend is going strong, editors notice. At this point, you have likely noticed it as well. Butter-yellow goodness is everywhere. Fashion people have adopted the pretty hue to be the color of the summer, and retailers have come prepared for the takeover. Three brands, in particular, that have an excellent selection of butter-yellow picks are Zara, Nordstrom, and J.Crew.I did a deep dive on each site and came up with a stellar list of standouts to get you through the season in style, whether you want to subtly incorporate the color or go full-on. Below, you'll find everything from pretty dresses to linen separates, cool bags, chic shoes, elevated basics, and more. Keep scrolling to shop 27 chic butter-yellow pieces for summer from Zara, Nordstrom, and J.Crew. J.Crew New Soleil Pant in Linen J.Crew aced it with these linen pants. Reformation Austine Johnny Collar Sleeveless Top Quick—this is selling out fast. Nordstrom Meggan Ankle Strap Sandal ZARA Satin Effect Foulard Dress & Other Stories Dakota Vest Perfect with jeans, skirts, or shorts. Topshop Sameena Bow Knot Faux Leather Shoulder Bag j.crew Mathilde Cap-Sleeve Dress in Luster Canvas Wit & Wisdom Sam High Waist Ankle Wide Leg Twill Pants ZARA Asymmetrical Ruched T-Shirt Obsessed with the neckline. ZARA Elongated Shoulder Bag Nordstrom Bias Cut Satin Midi Skirt ZARA Cotton Strappy Jumpsuit Dolce Vita Serina Sneaker Retro sneakers are trending. J.Crew Vintage Jersey Classic-Fit Crewneck T-Shirt I'll be wearing this on repeat. Favorite Daughter The Favorite Strapless Maxi Dress Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Jane Flat So many styling possibilities. J.Crew Étienne Oversized Shirt in Lightweight Oxford I want this in every color. Damson Madder Organic Cotton Midi Skirt Okay, it's more lemon yellow, but it's too chic to pass up. Princess Polly Passoni Lemon Cardigan Bring on the compliments. ZARA High-Waisted Linen Shorts ALDO Belerose Slide Sandal Sabrina Carpenter comes to mind. Le Monde Beryl Stella Mary Jane Flat J.Crew Harbor Short in Linen The whole look is a winner. & Other Stories Asymmetric Drape Sleeveless Top ZW Collection Embroidered Pleated Dress This one is guaranteed to sell out.
html:
One thing is certain: When a color trend is going strong, editors notice. At this point, you have likely noticed it as well. Butter-yellow goodness is everywhere. Fashion people have adopted the pretty hue to be the color of the summer, and retailers have come prepared for the takeover. Three brands, in particular, that have an excellent selection of butter-yellow picks are Zara, Nordstrom, and J.Crew.

I did a deep dive on each site and came up with a stellar list of standouts to get you through the season in style, whether you want to subtly incorporate the color or go full-on. Below, you'll find everything from pretty dresses to linen separates, cool bags, chic shoes, elevated basics, and more. Keep scrolling to shop 27 chic butter-yellow pieces for summer from Zara, Nordstrom, and J.Crew.

J.Crew

New Soleil Pant in Linen

J.Crew aced it with these linen pants.
